projects.title: SmartStore
projects.description: Technology marketplace where any user can sign up either to buy or sell products. Features a products catalog with search filters and shopping cart, a user control panel, and a payments simulator.

projects.title: Pawsome Friends
projects.description: Web app to promote the adoption of abandoned pets. Shelters can sign up to manage their registered pets, and anyone who wants to adopt has to submit a form providing contact details and related info.

projects.title: Issue Tracker
projects.description: An app with enhanced performance of HTTP requests using techniques like caching, server state management and error handling.

projects.title: TicTapToe
projects.description: Cool looking tic tac toe game developed from scratch, features a neumorphic design, scores bar, autosave, shape and starting player switches, as well as local storage of scores.
